content: grannyesque headband cayenne boyer december 2007 a granny square stretched out for your head very fast to crochet materials yarn worsted weight yarn i used knit picks shine worsted a 60% cotton 40% rayon yarn hook g abbreviations half_double_crochet half_double_crochet chain-# chain # 1 slip_stitch slip_stitch chain-space chain space round round pattern chain 66 row 1 half_double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook two more half_double_crochet repeat half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 chains chain-1 skip next chain until you reach the end and have 16 squares chain-2 this is 3 chains since last half_double_crochet and slip_stitch in bottom of end square round 1 chain-2 turn 2 half_double_crochet in this chain-space chain-1 in each chain-space on edge 3 half_double_crochet and chain-1 in each end chain-space 3 half_double_crochet chain-3 3 half_double_crochet chain-1 join with a slip_stitch when you reach turning chain round 2 repeat round 1 round 3 chain-1 turn on edges single_crochet once in each chain-space and twice in each set of half_double_crochet s on ends 2 single_crochet chain-32 single_crochet back along chain 2 more single_crochet in end loop when you reach the beginning of the round join to turning chain tie off and weave in ends if the pattern is unclear feel free to contact me i m throwing it together quickly when i should be writing a paper cid 13 c2007 cayenne boyer this design may not be made for sale 2
